name: honua-esri-leaflet-tests
description: End-to-end tests for Honua.Server Esri REST API using Esri Leaflet

scripts.test:headless: echo 'NOTE: headless tests require CORS config. Use test:api instead.' && node run-headless-playwright.js
scripts.test:browser: echo 'Browser tests require manual interaction. Starting server...' && http-server . -p 8888 -o test-runner.html

author: Honua Team
